janus.mm_wrapper.MMWrapper¶

class janus.mm_wrapper.MMWrapper(class_type, sys_info=None, sys_info_format=None, **kwargs)¶

A super class for all molecular mechanics wrappers

Note

Since MMWrapper is a super class and has abstract methods the user cannot actually instantiate a MMWrapper object, but only its child objects

__init__(class_type, sys_info=None, sys_info_format=None, **kwargs)¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.
